about_the_game:
Welcome to EstradaBus HD, a bus simulator developed by Estrada Digital Games.

The simulator produced by Estrada Digital Games has a very simple proposal: the transport of passengers in city and countryside maps, crossing between beautiful scenaries through several bus models available in game.

DEMO NOW AVALIABLE!!! Please, download in green button above!

The game counts with, initially, with six bus models, two maps and dozens of jobs as bus driver to improve your company!

A bus simulator with beautiful scenaries!


  • You can drive between paved and dirt roads:
  • Get jobs as bus driver;
  • Improve your bus company, buying new buses and garages!
  • Listen radios online during your jobs!
  • Dynamic weather, with sunny or storm days/nights!
  • Traffic system;
  • Relax and drive! xD!
  • As soon, support for mods to change skins and buses!
detailed_description:
Welcome to EstradaBus HD, a bus simulator developed by Estrada Digital Games.

The simulator produced by Estrada Digital Games has a very simple proposal: the transport of passengers in city and countryside maps, crossing between beautiful scenaries through several bus models available in game.

DEMO NOW AVALIABLE!!! Please, download in green button above!

The game counts with, initially, with six bus models, two maps and dozens of jobs as bus driver to improve your company!

A bus simulator with beautiful scenaries!


  • You can drive between paved and dirt roads:
  • Get jobs as bus driver;
  • Improve your bus company, buying new buses and garages!
  • Listen radios online during your jobs!
  • Dynamic weather, with sunny or storm days/nights!
  • Traffic system;
  • Relax and drive! xD!
  • As soon, support for mods to change skins and buses!
name: EstradaBus HD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel I3 3210 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics/NVIDIA GT 710/AMD Radeon HD 7570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 4600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950/AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring during development

short_description: Inspired by tropical scenarios, EstradaBus brings simulation of buses and other passenger transport vehicles. Work transporting passengers, your luggage, upgrade your fleet and buy new garages for your company!
